actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-736, by Mr. Linder.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 238.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-736, by Mr. Linder.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 4850.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 822.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4850) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005, and for other purposes.

summary.text:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4850 (District of Columbia Appropriations Act, 2005).

titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4850) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005, and for other purposes.

Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4850) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005, and for other purposes.
